short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Effortlessly match the exact moment in the VOD or clip you are watching with another streamer's perspective.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This VodSync.tv Twitch Player extensions allows you to quickly find different perspectives of the current VOD or clip you're watching. Once this extension is installed you'll notice a new button gets added to your Twitch player in the bottom right corner. This button allows you to specify which streamer you want to sync up with without leaving the video that you're watching.

This is the first version of the extension, so expect more and more features coming in the near future.

Visit our website for more information: https://vodsync.tv

***
Release v1.1 - 02/10/2024:
✅ Fixed visibility of the button in the Twitch player!

Release v1.0 - 19/9/2023:
✅ Added autocomplete!
       - We automatically try to suggest the streamer you want to find
       - The best matching channels (live, same stream category etc) will put on top of the list.
✅ Better error handling to improve user experience

Release v0.9 - 13/9/2023:
✅ Added a fix for dark mode
✅ Modal dialog is now also visible in theatre mode.

Release v0.8 - 29/8/2023:
✅ Extension now supports the redesigned Twitch mod view again

Release v0.7 - 2/8/2023:
✅ Better error handling to improve user experience

Release v0.6 - 26/6/2023:
✅ The magnifying glass is now also visible in mod view! Due to issues with 7tv interferring with the Twitch player this search button will be available in the bottom left of the mod view. All other pages (clips, VODs and livestreams) are not affected.
✅ Add hover effect to the button.

Release v0.5 - 21/6/2023:
✅ Add ability to watch other perspectives while watching a livestream. This will clip the last 30 seconds from the other streamer as soon as you click the button.
✅ We now save the last 5 username that had a succesful lookup, this allows you to sync a moment even faster.
✅ Better error handling.
